original_title: Deacon Blue Live At The Glasgow Barrowlands
overview: Live At The Glasgow Barrowlands was recorded and filmed at Glasgow's iconic Barrowland Ballroom and on the last night of the band's UK Believers Tour. Deacon Blue presented not only the hits of their most recent album Believers but also played their best loved songs from their 30-year career. This unforgettable performance is their first official live product in 10 years
title: Deacon Blue Live At The Glasgow Barrowlands
